fact_check_explanation_title: Do Notting Hill Carnival and Glastonbury have similar crime rates?
fact_check_explanation_summary: Figures which suggest that Notting Hill Carnival has a similar crime rate to Glastonbury are unreliable.

fact_check_explanation_title: Drinking water at set times does not provide certain health benefits
fact_check_explanation_summary: While it is a good idea to stay hydrated, drinking water at regimented times has no identifiable health benefits.

fact_check_explanation_title: This viral post about the costs of Brexit gets a lot of things wrong
fact_check_explanation_summary: A viral post about the “costs” of Brexit misrepresents a number of economic analyses.

fact_check_explanation_title: A brother and sister did not win the right to marry in the United States
fact_check_explanation_summary: Marriage between siblings is illegal in both the UK and US.

fact_check_explanation_title: Can refugees enter the UK illegally?
fact_check_explanation_summary: Refugees can’t be penalised for entering illegally if they are claiming asylum and coming from a place where their life or freedom are threatened.

fact_check_explanation_title: Misleading claim about pension age continues to circulate online
fact_check_explanation_summary: Facebook posts continue to falsely claim the government is planning to raise the pension age to 75. It is a policy recommendation from the Centre for Social Justice.

fact_check_explanation_title: Poland has not refused to allow the building of mosques
fact_check_explanation_summary: A similar view has been expressed by a Polish politician but it is not government policy.

fact_check_explanation_title: This picture of a man swimming with a jaguar isn’t from the 2019 Amazon fires
fact_check_explanation_summary: The picture was probably taken in 2016 and shows a soldier swimming with one of the army’s jaguar mascots, called Jiquitaia.

fact_check_explanation_title: Does a no deal Brexit mean no divorce bill?
fact_check_explanation_summary: It’s highly uncertain whether or not the UK would have to pay the divorce bill, if it left the EU with no deal.

fact_check_explanation_title: The EU doesn’t have a 30% tariff on African cocoa imports
fact_check_explanation_summary: The vast majority of African countries can export cocoa to the EU tariff-free.

fact_check_explanation_title: Sadiq Khan was a solicitor for the Nation of Islam
fact_check_explanation_summary: He represented the group back when he was a human rights lawyer.

fact_check_explanation_title: How many emergency patients are waiting over four hours for a bed?
fact_check_explanation_summary: There was more than a 7x increase in the number of emergency admissions taking more than four hours from decision to admit to admission from 2010 to 2018.
